reviewText:
I would not recommend this product and wish there was a way to get my money back. My expectation is that it would cover, in depth, the features and functions of the GPS unit that were only given cursory coverage in the users guide that came with the device. The fact is, that the video only reiterates the limited information that was in the users guide.

Not worth very much..
This DVD is crap,  Don't waste your money.  Does not give any detail other than showing the screens and it does a poor job of that.  A 2 year old could make a better DVD.
